article_text:
Plattsburgh, NY (12901)

Today

Partly cloudy in the morning followed by scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: CARA CHAPMAN Press-Republican

og.description: Most allegations last year in Clinton and Essex counties sexual in nature
og.title: Child abuse cases number in 100s
